trans-unit.source: Serves as the base class for custom ASP.NET Web Parts controls, adding to the base <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part" /> class features some additional user interface (UI) properties, the ability to create connections, and personalization behavior.
trans-unit.target: 用作自定义 ASP.NET Web 部件控件的基类，为 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part" /> 基类功能添加了一些附加用户界面 (UI) 属性、创建连接的能力和个性化行为。

trans-unit.source: When you create controls with Web Parts functionality, you have two basic options.
trans-unit.target: 当你创建具有 Web 部件功能的控件时，你具有两个基本选项。

trans-unit.source: You can create custom controls that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class, or you can create or use other server controls.
trans-unit.target: 你可以创建自定义控件派生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>类，也可以创建或使用其他服务器控件。

trans-unit.source: Existing ASP.NET controls, custom server controls, and user controls can all be given full Web Parts functionality by declaring them within (or adding them programmatically to) a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> zone control, with the result that they will be wrapped with <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> objects at run time and treated as true <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: 现有的 ASP.NET 控件、 自定义服务器控件和用户控件可以对所有可指定完整的 Web 部件功能通过声明内为这些 （或将它们添加到以编程方式）<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>区域控件，结果将与包装它们<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>在运行时对象，并视为 true<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件。

trans-unit.source: For details, see the documentation for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> class.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅的文档<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>类。

trans-unit.source: For speed of development and maximum reuse of code, using existing server controls can be a good option.
trans-unit.target: 有关开发速度和最大限度重用，使用现有的服务器控件可以是代码的一个不错的选择。

trans-unit.source: For maximum programmatic control over the behavior and Web Parts functionality of controls, creating a custom control that inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class is often the best option.
trans-unit.target: 为了最大以编程方式控制的行为和 Web 部件控件的功能，请创建一个自定义控件继承自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>类通常是最佳选项。

trans-unit.source: The abstract <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class inherits from the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part> control and provides the basic elements for all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: 抽象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>类继承自基类<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part>控件并为所有提供的基本元素<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件。

trans-unit.source: The class includes a common set of properties that affect the appearance of the UI.
trans-unit.target: 该类包括一组通用的影响的用户界面的外观的属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowClose%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowConnect%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowEdit%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowHide%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowMinimize%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowZoneChange%2A> properties each specify whether the user of a Web application is permitted to interact with the part control in the way indicated by the given property name.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowClose%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowConnect%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowEdit%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowHide%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowMinimize%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowZoneChange%2A>每个属性指定是否允许 Web 应用程序的用户与部分的控件，通过给定的属性所指示的方式进行交互名称。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.CatalogIconImageUrl%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ChromeState%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ChromeType%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Description%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Height%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.HelpUrl%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Hidden%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Title%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.TitleIconImageUrl%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.TitleUrl%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Width%2A> properties determine the size, visibility, appearance, and supporting content (such as a title and a description) for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.CatalogIconImageUrl%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ChromeState%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ChromeType%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Description%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Height%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.HelpUrl%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Hidden%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Title%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.TitleIconImageUrl%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.TitleUrl%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Width%2A>属性确定的大小，可见性外观，并且支持内容 （如标题和说明）<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件。

trans-unit.source: The relationship of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control to its context within the Web Parts control set is determined by properties such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.WebPartManager%2A>, which holds a reference to the control's associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> object, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Zone%2A>, which references the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone> that contains the control.
trans-unit.target: 之间的关系<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件添加到 Web 部件控件集如由属性在其上下文<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.WebPartManager%2A>，它保存对控件的引用的关联<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>对象，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Zone%2A>，后者引用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone>包含该控件。

trans-unit.source: There can be only one <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control per page, and each instance of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control can reside within only one <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone> at a time.
trans-unit.target: 可能只有一个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>，每页、 控制和每个实例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件可以驻留在只有一个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone>一次。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control can be placed outside of a zone on a Web page, but in this case it functions as a normal server control and loses nearly all Web Parts functionality.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件可以放置在网页上，区域之外，但在这种情况下它的函数作为正常的服务器控件和丢失几乎所有 Web 部件功能。

trans-unit.source: Several other important properties affect unique features of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: 其他几个重要属性会影响的唯一功能<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A> property allows developers to set an arbitrary string that can be used as a filter at run time to determine whether a control is added to the page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A>属性允许开发人员设置可以用作筛选器在运行时以确定是否将控件添加到页面的任意字符串。

trans-unit.source: Used together with a feature such as role management, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A> property provides a useful mechanism for creating views based on defined user roles.
trans-unit.target: 与角色管理，如功能结合使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A>属性提供有用的机制，用于创建基于定义的用户角色的视图。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ExportMode%2A> property indicates whether, during an export, all the available property data on a control is exported, or only the non-sensitive data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ExportMode%2A>属性指示是否在导出期间，在控件上的所有可用的属性数据导出，或仅非敏感数据。

trans-unit.source: This allows developers to distinguish between data that is sensitive and data that is not, for security purposes.
trans-unit.target: 这样，开发人员来区分是敏感的数据和不是，出于安全目的的数据。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.WebBrowsableObject%2A> property returns a reference to an instance of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, so that an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control can edit it when the page is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.WebBrowsableObject%2A>属性返回的实例的引用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件，以便<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>控制当页面处于编辑模式时可以编辑它。

trans-unit.source: Finally, there are several properties that indicate the status of the control relative to the rest of the page.
trans-unit.target: 最后，有几个属性指示相对于页的其余部分的控件的状态。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsClosed%2A> property indicates whether a control is closed (and thus added to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart> object), or if it is open and available on the page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsClosed%2A>属性指示控件是否已关闭 (并因此添加到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart>对象)，或如果它已打开并且可在页面。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared%2A> property indicates whether a control is a shared control (versus a user-specific control), meaning that it is visible to all users of a Web page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared%2A>属性指示控件是否为共享的控件 （而不是特定于用户的控件），这意味着它对 Web 页的所有用户可见。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStandalone%2A> property indicates whether a control is currently contained in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>-derived zone (such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStandalone%2A>属性指示控件当前是否包含在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>-派生区域 (如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>)。

trans-unit.source: A value of `false` indicates the control is inside a zone and thus has full Web Parts functionality.
trans-unit.target: 值为`false`指示该控件处于区域内，因此不具有完整的 Web 部件功能。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStatic%2A> property indicates whether a control is static or dynamic.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStatic%2A>属性指示控件是否是静态或动态。

trans-unit.source: A static control is declared in the markup of a Web page, whereas a dynamic control is added programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 而动态控制以编程方式添加的网页，标记中声明静态控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class also provides several methods that determine what happens at various points in the control's life cycle.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>类还提供了确定发生的情况不同的时间点在控件的生命周期中的一些方法。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.OnConnectModeChanged%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.OnEditModeChanged%2A> methods can both be overridden in a derived class to provide programmatic control over the rendering of a control's contents during the event that corresponds to each method's name.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.OnConnectModeChanged%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.OnEditModeChanged%2A>方法都可在重写派生类提供对控件的内容的每个方法的名称对应的事件执行过程的呈现进行编程控制。

trans-unit.source: Classes that derive from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> can add <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb> objects to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 派生自的类<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>可以添加<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb>对象添加到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: The verbs are rendered in a verbs menu, which appears in the title bar of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 谓词呈现在一个谓词菜单，其中将显示在标题栏的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb> objects provide simple UI elements for common user actions such as hiding or minimizing the control or displaying Help.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb> 对象提供常见的用户操作，如隐藏或最小化控件或显示帮助的简单 UI 元素。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.CreateEditorParts%2A> method creates a collection of any custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls that are associated with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.CreateEditorParts%2A>方法创建的任何自定义集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>与关联的控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件。

trans-unit.source: Developers can override this method so that it creates custom controls designed specifically to edit their <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 开发人员可以替代此方法，以便它创建自定义控件专门用于编辑其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件。

trans-unit.source: The method is called when a user clicks the edit verb on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 当用户单击编辑谓词时调用该方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control and reference it in a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何创建<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制并在网页中引用它。

trans-unit.source: The first part of the example contains the code for a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control named `TextDisplayWebPart`.
trans-unit.target: 该示例的第一部分包含自定义代码<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件名为`TextDisplayWebPart`。

trans-unit.source: This control demonstrates how to create a simple custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control that gives you access to the features of the Web Parts control set.
trans-unit.target: 此控件演示如何创建简单的自定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件，可以访问的功能的 Web 部件控件集。

trans-unit.source: For the code example to run, you must compile this source code.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。

trans-unit.source: You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache.
trans-unit.target: 你可以显式编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将动态编译运行时将源代码。

trans-unit.source: This code example assumes that you compile the source code into an assembly, place it in a Bin subfolder of your Web application, and reference the assembly with a `Register` directive in your Web page.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例假定你将源代码编译到程序集、 将其放置在 Web 应用程序的 Bin 子文件夹和引用与程序集`Register`指令在 Web 页中。

trans-unit.source: For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08).
trans-unit.target: 有关演示的编译这两种方法的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。

trans-unit.source: The second part of the example shows how to reference the `TextDisplayWebPart` control in an ASP.NET Web page.
trans-unit.target: 该示例的第二部分演示如何引用`TextDisplayWebPart`ASP.NET 网页中的控件。

trans-unit.source: Notice that many of the various <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> properties can be assigned declaratively to the custom control.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，许多的各种<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>属性可以以声明方式分配给自定义控件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the class for use by an inherited class instance.
trans-unit.target: 初始化该类供继承的类实例使用。

trans-unit.source: This constructor can only be called by an inherited class.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数只能由继承的类调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.%23ctor%2A> constructor initializes default values for several UI-oriented properties, including the various `Allow` properties that determine the control's capabilities.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.%23ctor%2A>构造函数初始化默认值为面向用户界面的多个属性，包括各种`Allow`确定控件的功能的属性。

trans-unit.source: These properties are then incorporated into an inherited class instance.
trans-unit.target: 这些属性然后并入继承的类实例。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how a control that derives from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class inherits the default property values set in the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.%23ctor%2A> constructor, but then changes the value of one property in the constructor of the derived control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何从派生的控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>类继承的基中设置的默认属性值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.%23ctor%2A>构造函数，但然后将更改派生的控件的构造函数中的一个属性的值。

trans-unit.source: The first part of this example contains the code for a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control named `TextDisplayWebPart`.
trans-unit.target: 此示例的第一部分包含自定义代码<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件名为`TextDisplayWebPart`。

trans-unit.source: This control demonstrates how to create a simple custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control that gives you access to the features of the Web Parts control set.
trans-unit.target: 此控件演示如何创建简单的自定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件，可以访问的功能的 Web 部件控件集。

trans-unit.source: Note that in the constructor of the custom control, the `TextDisplayWebPart.AllowClose` property is set to `false`, which has the effect of preventing users from closing the control on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，在构造函数的自定义控件，`TextDisplayWebPart.AllowClose`属性设置为`false`，它具有阻止用户关闭 Web 页上的控件的效果。

trans-unit.source: For the code example to run, you must compile this source code.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。

trans-unit.source: You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache.
trans-unit.target: 你可以显式编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将动态编译运行时将源代码。

trans-unit.source: This code example assumes that you compile the source code into an assembly, place it in a Bin subfolder of your Web application, and reference the assembly with a `Register` directive in your Web page.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例假定你将源代码编译到程序集、 将其放置在 Web 应用程序的 Bin 子文件夹和引用与程序集`Register`指令在 Web 页中。

trans-unit.source: For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08).
trans-unit.target: 有关演示的编译这两种方法的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。

trans-unit.source: The second part of the example shows how to reference the `TextDisplayWebPart` control in an ASP.NET Web page.
trans-unit.target: 该示例的第二部分演示如何引用`TextDisplayWebPart`ASP.NET 网页中的控件。

trans-unit.source: After you load the page in a browser, if you click the verbs menu in the title bar of the custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, the close verb is now disabled, which prevents users from closing the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果单击自定义的标题栏中的谓词菜单加载在浏览器中，页后<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>现在禁用控件，关闭谓词，从而防止用户关闭控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an end user can close a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示最终用户是否可以在网页上关闭 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control can be closed on a Web page; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以在网页关闭该控件，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: After a user closes a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control on a Web page, the control is no longer visible or available on the page.
trans-unit.target: 用户关闭后<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件在网页上，控件不再是可见还是的页上提供。

trans-unit.source: The closed control is added to the page catalog, a Web Parts entity that stores a reference to the control.
trans-unit.target: 已关闭的控件添加到页目录中，将存储对控件的引用的 Web 部件实体。

trans-unit.source: If a developer adds a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart> control to the page within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone> control, users are able to switch the page to catalog display mode, select the closed control in the page catalog, and add it back to the page.
trans-unit.target: 如果开发人员添加了<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart>控件添加到内的页<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone>控件，用户就能够将页面切换到目录的显示模式，在页目录中，选择已关闭的控件并将其添加回页面。

trans-unit.source: A closed <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control can be added back to a page either programmatically, or by a user who selects the closed control from the page catalog when the page is in catalog display mode.
trans-unit.target: 关闭<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件可以添加回页面通过编程方式，或从页目录中选择已关闭的控件，如果页已在目录中的用户显示模式。

trans-unit.source: Closing a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control is different from deleting it.
trans-unit.target: 关闭<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件是不同于删除它。

trans-unit.source: A closed control can be added back to a page, while a deleted control is permanently removed.
trans-unit.target: 已关闭的控件可以添加回页面中，而永久删除已删除的控件。

trans-unit.source: For more information on deleting controls, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DeleteWebPart%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 删除控件的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DeleteWebPart%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Closing a control is also different from hiding it.
trans-unit.target: 关闭控件也是不同于隐藏的。

trans-unit.source: A control that is hidden is still present on the page, still participates in page life cycle events, and is only hidden from the user's view, but a closed control is not even rendered on a page.
trans-unit.target: 但仍会出现在页上，仍参与页面生命周期事件，并从用户的视图，只会隐藏已关闭的控件甚至不呈现在页上，隐藏的控件。

trans-unit.source: Both static and dynamic <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls (static controls are declared in a page's markup, while dynamic controls are added programmatically) can be closed.
trans-unit.target: 静态和动态<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>可以关闭 （静态控件声明在页面的标记中，在以编程方式添加动态控件） 的控件。

trans-unit.source: If a developer sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowClose%2A> property to `false`, a close verb does not appear on the control, and the user is not able to close the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果开发人员设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowClose%2A>属性`false`、 关闭谓词未出现在该控件，并且用户不是能够关闭控件。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。

trans-unit.source: The personalization scope of this property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.Shared> and can be modified only by authorized users.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的个性化作用域设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.Shared>和仅授权用户可以修改。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute> and [Web Parts Personalization Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute>和[Web 部件个性化概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to change the default setting of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowClose%2A> property for a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, so that it cannot be closed.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何更改默认设置的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowClose%2A>自定义属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制，以便它不能关闭。

trans-unit.source: The first part of this example contains the code for a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control named `TextDisplayWebPart`.
trans-unit.target: 此示例的第一部分包含自定义代码<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件名为`TextDisplayWebPart`。

trans-unit.source: Note that in the constructor of the custom control, the `TextDisplayWebPart.AllowClose` property is set to `false`, which has the effect of preventing users from closing the control on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，在构造函数的自定义控件，`TextDisplayWebPart.AllowClose`属性设置为`false`，它具有阻止用户关闭 Web 页上的控件的效果。

trans-unit.source: This means that the close verb on the verbs menu of the control will be disabled for users.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着，将为用户禁用控件的谓词菜单上的关闭谓词。

trans-unit.source: For the code example to run, you must compile this source code.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。

trans-unit.source: You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache.
trans-unit.target: 你可以显式编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将动态编译运行时将源代码。

trans-unit.source: This code example assumes that you compile the source code into an assembly, place it in a Bin subfolder of your Web application, and reference the assembly with a `Register` directive in your Web page.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例假定你将源代码编译到程序集、 将其放置在 Web 应用程序的 Bin 子文件夹和引用与程序集`Register`指令在 Web 页中。

trans-unit.source: For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08).
trans-unit.target: 有关演示的编译这两种方法的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。

trans-unit.source: The second part of the example shows how to reference the `TextDisplayWebPart` control in an ASP.NET Web page.
trans-unit.target: 该示例的第二部分演示如何引用`TextDisplayWebPart`ASP.NET 网页中的控件。

trans-unit.source: Note that in the `<aspSample:TextDisplayWebPart>` element that references the control, you could also change the value of the property set by the control's constructor.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，在`<aspSample:TextDisplayWebPart>`引用控件的元素，您还可以更改控件的构造函数设置的属性的值。

trans-unit.source: To allow the control to be closed, simply add an `AllowClose="true"` attribute to the element in the declarative markup.
trans-unit.target: 若要允许控件即将关闭，只需添加`AllowClose="true"`属性设为声明性的标记中的元素。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control allows other controls to form connections with it.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控件是否允许其他控件与之形成连接。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether connections can be formed with the control.
trans-unit.target: 指示是否可以与此控件形成连接的布尔值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The property value can be set declaratively in page markup, or programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 在页标记中，或以编程方式，可以以声明方式设置的属性值。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。

trans-unit.source: The personalization scope of this property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.Shared> and can be modified only by authorized users.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的个性化作用域设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.Shared>和仅授权用户可以修改。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute> and [Web Parts Personalization Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute>和[Web 部件个性化概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an end user can modify a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control through the user interface (UI) provided by one or more <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" /> controls.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示最终用户是否可以通过一个或多个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控件提供的用户界面 (UI) 修改 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" /> 控件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control can be modified; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以修改 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控件，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: To allow end users to edit a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowEdit%2A> property must be set to `true` (the default), and the page's display mode must be in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 若要允许最终用户能够编辑<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowEdit%2A>属性必须设置为`true`（默认值）、 和页的显示模式必须处于编辑模式。

trans-unit.source: Display modes are represented by fields in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: 显示模式中的字段由表示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the mode is <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode>.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下的模式是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode>。

trans-unit.source: For details about page display modes and how to change them, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 模式和如何更改它们，将显示有关页面的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode>类概述。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowEdit%2A> property is set to `false` either declaratively or programmatically, editing options are limited.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowEdit%2A>属性设置为`false`编辑选项以声明方式或以编程方式，将受到限制。

trans-unit.source: The only possible editing operations are changes to the page's layout, using a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control, or other basic operations enabled through custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: 可能的编辑操作仅对该页面的布局更改，则使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>控件或通过自定义启用其他基本操作<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>控件。

trans-unit.source: For an example that uses <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls from the Web Parts control set and shows how to enable editing of a custom Web Parts control, see [Walkthrough: Creating a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e05b659c-d6da-46cb-b177-48efe55f2770).
trans-unit.target: 有关示例，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>控件从 Web 部件控件集，并演示如何启用编辑自定义 Web 部件控件，请参阅[演练： 创建 Web 部件页](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e05b659c-d6da-46cb-b177-48efe55f2770)。

trans-unit.source: The effect that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowEdit%2A> property has on a control's behavior is also impacted by the current personalization scope of the Web page, and the individual Web Parts controls on that page.
trans-unit.target: 产生的效果，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowEdit%2A>属性对控件的行为由当前的个性化设置范围的网页上，也会受到影响和该页面上的单个 Web 部件控件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Web Parts Personalization Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[Web 部件个性化概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320)。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。

trans-unit.source: The personalization scope of this property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.Shared> and can be modified only by authorized users.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的个性化作用域设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.Shared>和仅授权用户可以修改。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute> and [Web Parts Personalization Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute>和[Web 部件个性化概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to change the default setting of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowEdit%2A> property for a Web Parts control, so that the control cannot be edited.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何更改默认设置的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowEdit%2A>的 Web 部件的属性控制，以使控件不能进行编辑。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes the use of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, `TextDisplayWebPart`, which is found in the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 此示例假定使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件， `TextDisplayWebPart`，其中的示例部分中可以找到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>类概述。

trans-unit.source: The code example also uses a custom user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web Parts page.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例还使用自定义用户控件，使用户能够更改 Web 部件页面上的显示模式。

trans-unit.source: The user control is referenced by means of a `Register` directive near the top of the Web page that hosts the user control.
trans-unit.target: 该用户控件引用的方式`Register`指令承载用户控件的 Web 页面顶部附近。

trans-unit.source: For a detailed description of how to create this user control and work with display modes, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何创建此用户控件和显示模式使用的详细说明，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。

trans-unit.source: In the declarative markup for the Web page, on the `<aspSample:TextDisplayWebPart>` element that references the control, note the `AllowEdit="false"` attribute.
trans-unit.target: 在网页上，声明性标记上`<aspSample:TextDisplayWebPart>`元素引用该控件，请注意`AllowEdit="false"`属性。

trans-unit.source: Although `true` is the default, the attribute has been set to `false` for the purposes of this example.
trans-unit.target: 尽管`true`是默认设置，该属性已设置为`false`此示例的目的。

trans-unit.source: Load the page in a browser and use the **Display Modes** drop-down list control to change the display mode to edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 加载的浏览器并使用页**显示模式**下拉列表控件来更改要编辑模式的显示模式。

trans-unit.source: Next, click the verbs menu in the title bar of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, and note that the edit verb is missing, because you disabled editing on the control.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，单击的标题栏中的谓词菜单<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制，并记下编辑谓词已丢失，因为禁用编辑控件上。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether end users are allowed to hide a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否允许最终用户隐藏 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control can be hidden; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以隐藏 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控件，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowHide%2A> property determines whether users can modify the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Hidden%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowHide%2A>属性确定用户是否可以修改<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Hidden%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: In the default case, when the property value is `true`, users can change the value when the control is being edited.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，当属性值为`true`，正在编辑的控件时，用户可以更改的值。

trans-unit.source: By default, controls are not hidden and their <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Hidden%2A> property value is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，未隐藏控件及其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Hidden%2A>属性值是`false`。

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control is being edited, if a user selects a check box to hide the control (which sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Hidden%2A> property to `true`), the control will no longer be visible when the page returns to browse mode.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>所编辑的控件，如果用户选择一个复选框以隐藏控件 (哪些集<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Hidden%2A>属性`true`)，该控件将不再可见时将页返回到浏览模式。

trans-unit.source: Hidden controls are distinct from controls that are closed, because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Hidden%2A> property has a distinct meaning within the Web Parts control set.
trans-unit.target: 隐藏的控件有别于控件均已关闭，因为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Hidden%2A>属性具有不同的含义在 Web 部件控件集内。

trans-unit.source: Closed controls are not even rendered on a page, and do not participate in page life cycle events.
trans-unit.target: 已关闭的控件甚至不呈现在页中，并不参与页面生命周期事件。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, while hidden <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls are not visible to users, they are still rendered on a Web page, are still contained in a zone, and can still maintain connections with other <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls as part of a Web Parts application.
trans-unit.target: 相反，而隐藏<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件没有对用户可见，它们仍呈现在网页上，是否仍包含在区域中，并仍保持与其他连接<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件作为 Web 部件应用程序的一部分。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。

trans-unit.source: The personalization scope of this property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.Shared> and can be modified only by authorized users.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的个性化作用域设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.Shared>和仅授权用户可以修改。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute> and [Web Parts Personalization Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute>和[Web 部件个性化概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to change the default setting of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowHide%2A> property for a custom Web Parts control, so that the custom control cannot be hidden by a user.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何更改默认设置的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowHide%2A>属性自定义 Web 部件控件，以便无法通过用户隐藏自定义控件。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes the use of a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, `TextDisplayWebPart`, which is found in the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 此示例假定使用自定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件， `TextDisplayWebPart`，其中的示例部分中可以找到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>类概述。

trans-unit.source: The code example also uses a custom user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web Parts page.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例还使用自定义用户控件，使用户能够更改 Web 部件页面上的显示模式。

trans-unit.source: The user control is referenced by means of a `Register` directive near the top of the Web page that hosts the user control.
trans-unit.target: 该用户控件引用的方式`Register`指令承载用户控件的 Web 页面顶部附近。

trans-unit.source: For a detailed description of how to create this user control and work with display modes, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何创建此用户控件和显示模式使用的详细说明，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。

trans-unit.source: In the declarative markup for the Web page, on the `<aspSample:TextDisplayWebPart>` element that references the control, note the `AllowHide="false"` attribute, which prevents a user who is editing the control from being able to hide it.
trans-unit.target: 在网页上，声明性标记上`<aspSample:TextDisplayWebPart>`元素引用该控件，请注意`AllowHide="false"`属性，这会阻止从能够隐藏该控件编辑的用户。

trans-unit.source: Load the page in a browser and use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to change the display mode to edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 加载的浏览器并使用页**显示模式**下拉列表控件来更改要编辑模式的显示模式。

trans-unit.source: Next, click the verbs menu in the title bar of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control and click the edit verb.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，单击的标题栏中的谓词菜单<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件，然后单击编辑谓词。

trans-unit.source: As the edit user interface (UI) is displayed, you can see that the UI to edit the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Hidden%2A> property is now disabled, which occurred because you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowHide%2A> property value to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 显示编辑用户界面 (UI) 时，你可以看到，UI 以编辑<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Hidden%2A>现在禁用属性，因为你设置发生<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowHide%2A>属性值设置为`false`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether end users can minimize a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示最终用户是否可以最小化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control can be minimized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以最小化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控件，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowMinimize%2A> property, if set to `false`, prevents an end user from being able to minimize the control, and the user interface (UI) for minimizing the control does not appear in the control's title bar.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowMinimize%2A>属性，如果设置为`false`，防止最终用户能够以最小化控件，以及用户界面 (UI) 的最小化控件未显示在控件的标题栏中。

trans-unit.source: In Web Parts terminology, when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowMinimize%2A> property is set to `false`, the minimize verb does not appear on the control's verbs menu.
trans-unit.target: 在 Web 部件术语中，当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowMinimize%2A>属性设置为`false`，最小化谓词不会不会出现在控件的谓词菜单。

trans-unit.source: When a user minimizes a control, it reduces the control's size down to a minimal area that displays only part of the control's title bar and title.
trans-unit.target: 当用户最小化控件时，它减少了下显示仅的控件的标题栏和标题的一部分的最小区域控件的大小。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。

trans-unit.source: The personalization scope of this property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.Shared> and can be modified only by authorized users.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的个性化作用域设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.Shared>和仅授权用户可以修改。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute> and [Web Parts Personalization Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute>和[Web 部件个性化概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to change the default setting of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowMinimize%2A> property for a custom Web Parts control, so that the control cannot be minimized by a user.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何更改默认设置的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowMinimize%2A>属性自定义 Web 部件控件，以便控件不能最小化用户。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes the use of a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, `TextDisplayWebPart`, which is found in the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 此示例假定使用自定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件， `TextDisplayWebPart`，其中的示例部分中可以找到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>类概述。

trans-unit.source: In the declarative markup for the Web page, on the `<aspSample:TextDisplayWebPart>` element that references the control, note the `AllowMinimize="false"` attribute, which hides the minimize verb in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control's verbs menu, and prevents a user from being able to minimize the control.
trans-unit.target: 在网页上，声明性标记上`<aspSample:TextDisplayWebPart>`元素引用该控件，请注意`AllowMinimize="false"`属性，隐藏中的最小化动词<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件的谓词菜单中，并且将阻止用户可以最小化控件。

trans-unit.source: Load the page in a browser, and click the verbs menu on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 在浏览器中，加载页，然后单击谓词菜单<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件。

trans-unit.source: The minimize verb, which would normally be present on the verbs menu, is hidden because you disabled it in the declarative markup for the control.
trans-unit.target: 最小化谓词，通常会出现的谓词菜单上，因为已禁用控件的声明性标记中隐藏。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a user can move a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control between <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase" /> zones.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示用户是否可以在两个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 区域之间移动 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase" /> 控件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control can move between zones; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控件可在两个区域之间移动，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowZoneChange%2A> property is `true`, and a Web page is in a display mode that allows layout changes (such as edit or design mode), a user can change the page layout by moving a control to another <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zone on the page.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowZoneChange%2A>属性是`true`，和 Web 页处于允许布局更改 （如编辑或设计模式） 的显示模式下时，用户可以通过将控件移到另一个更改页面布局<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>页上的区域。

trans-unit.source: If the property is set to `false`, a control cannot be moved between zones, but can still be moved within its current zone.
trans-unit.target: 如果该属性设置为`false`，则控件不能区域，之间移动，但仍可以在其当前的区域内移动。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。

trans-unit.source: The personalization scope of this property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.Shared> and can be modified only by authorized users.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的个性化作用域设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.Shared>和仅授权用户可以修改。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute> and [Web Parts Personalization Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute>和[Web 部件个性化概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to change the default setting of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowZoneChange%2A> property for a custom Web Parts control, so that an end user cannot move the control to a different zone.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何更改默认设置的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowZoneChange%2A>的自定义 Web 部件的属性控制，以便最终用户不能将控件移至另一个区域。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes the use of a custom control, `TextDisplayWebPart`, which is found in the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 此示例假定自定义控件，使用`TextDisplayWebPart`，其中的示例部分中可以找到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>类概述。

trans-unit.source: The code example also uses a custom user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web Parts page.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例还使用自定义用户控件，使用户能够更改 Web 部件页面上的显示模式。

trans-unit.source: The user control is referenced by means of a `Register` directive near the top of the Web page that hosts the user control.
trans-unit.target: 该用户控件引用的方式`Register`指令承载用户控件的 Web 页面顶部附近。

trans-unit.source: For a detailed description of how to create this user control and work with display modes, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何创建此用户控件和显示模式使用的详细说明，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。

trans-unit.source: In the declarative markup for the Web Page, on the second `<aspSample:TextDisplayWebPart>` element, note the `AllowZoneChange="false"` attribute.
trans-unit.target: 在网页上，在第二个声明性标记`<aspSample:TextDisplayWebPart>`元素，请注意`AllowZoneChange="false"`属性。

trans-unit.source: At run time, an end user could drag the first control into **WebPartZone2**, but could not do the same with the second control.
trans-unit.target: 在运行时，最终用户可以拖动到第一个控件**WebPartZone2**，但不能相同，但有第二个控件。

trans-unit.source: Load the page in a browser and use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to change the display mode to design mode.
trans-unit.target: 加载的浏览器并使用页**显示模式**下拉列表控件来显示模式更改为设计模式。

trans-unit.source: Try to drag each of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls into another zone, and note the different behavior based on the values of their <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowZoneChange%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 尝试将每个拖动<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件添加到另一个区域，并记下不同的行为的值为基础的其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowZoneChange%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an arbitrary string to determine whether a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control is authorized to be added to a page.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个任意字符串，以确定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控件是否已被授权添加至页中。

trans-unit.source: A string that authorizes a control to be added to a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 授权控件可添加至网页的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control set does not implement any default behavior for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Web 部件控件集不实现任何默认行为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: However, the property is provided so that you can assign an arbitrary string value to a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control; this property can be checked by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control during its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.AuthorizeWebPart> event to determine whether the control can be added to the page.
trans-unit.target: 但是，以便你可以将任意字符串值分配给自定义提供该属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件; 由检查此属性可以<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>期间控制其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.AuthorizeWebPart>事件，以确定是否可以将控件添加到页面.

trans-unit.source: In some cases, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A> property might be used with the ASP.NET role manager feature, so that if a user is in a certain role, and if the string value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A> property meets certain conditions set by the developer, then the control can be added.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A>因此，如果用户位于某一特定角色，并且可能会使用 ASP.NET 角色管理器功能，使用属性的字符串值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A>属性都满足某些条件设置由开发人员，则可以添加控件。

trans-unit.source: This approach allows developers to create custom views of a page based on a combination of roles and other authorization criteria that they specify.
trans-unit.target: 此方法允许开发人员创建的基于角色和它们指定其他授权条件的组合的页的自定义视图。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。

trans-unit.source: The personalization scope of this property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.Shared> and can be modified only by authorized users.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的个性化作用域设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.Shared>和仅授权用户可以修改。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute> and [Web Parts Personalization Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute>和[Web 部件个性化概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何将<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: It shows how to set a custom method handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.AuthorizeWebPart> event, so that the handler can provide custom filtering code for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnAuthorizeWebPart%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 它演示如何设置的自定义的方法处理程序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.AuthorizeWebPart>事件，从而使处理程序可以提供自定义筛选代码<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnAuthorizeWebPart%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This example would be a typical way for a page developer to provide a filtering scenario and authorization of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls to be added to a page.
trans-unit.target: 此示例将页开发人员提供筛选的方案和授权的典型方式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件添加到页。

trans-unit.source: In the Web page code, notice that the `<asp:webpartmanager>` element has the `OnAuthorizeWebPart` attribute with the name of the event handler assigned to it.
trans-unit.target: 在网页代码中，请注意，`<asp:webpartmanager>`元素具有`OnAuthorizeWebPart`具有分配给它的事件处理程序名称属性。

trans-unit.source: This method checks whether the controls on the page have their <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A> property value set to `admin`, and if so, returns `true`, which means that they will be authorized and added to the page.
trans-unit.target: 此方法检查页上的控件是否具有其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A>属性值设置为`admin`，并且如果是这样，则返回`true`，这意味着它们将被授权并添加到页面。

trans-unit.source: Note that controls that do not have any value assigned to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A> property are added as well, because they are assumed not to be part of a filtering scenario.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，控件不具有任何值分配给<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A>属性还将添加，因为它们都被认为不是筛选方案的一部分。

trans-unit.source: This would be a common approach in a filtering scenario: some controls would be filtered, and others would not be, because they are presumed to be available for all users.
trans-unit.target: 此操作可能是筛选方案中常用的方法： 将筛选某些控件，并且其他人不会因为其假定为可供所有用户。

trans-unit.source: Because setting up users in roles is beyond the scope of this topic, this code example does not check user roles in the filtering.
trans-unit.target: 设置角色中的用户不在本主题的范围，因为此代码示例将不会检查中筛选的用户角色。

trans-unit.source: However, the scenario of filtering controls according to user roles is likely to be one of the most common uses of this filtering feature.
trans-unit.target: 但是，筛选控件根据用户角色的方案是，可能需要此筛选功能的最常见用途之一。

trans-unit.source: If you have roles on your site, and you want to check user roles in this method to filter controls, the method would resemble the following code block (versus the simpler approach in the preceding code example that does not use roles).
trans-unit.target: 如果角色对你的站点，并且你想要检查此方法以筛选控件中的用户角色，该方法类似于下面的代码块 （而不是在前面的代码示例不使用角色更简单的方法）。

trans-unit.source: To use this property, you must create a custom <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control, and override either its <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnAuthorizeWebPart(System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartAuthorizationEventArgs)" /> method or its <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.IsAuthorized(System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart)" /> method to handle the check for the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此属性，必须创建自定义<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" />控制，并重写其<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnAuthorizeWebPart(System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartAuthorizationEventArgs)" />方法或其<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.IsAuthorized(System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart)" />方法以处理的检查<see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter" />属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL to an image that represents a Web Parts control in a catalog of controls.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置图像的 URL，该图像在控件目录中表示一个 Web 部件控件。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the URL to an image used to represent the control in a catalog.
trans-unit.target: 表示图像的 URL 的字符串，该图像用于在目录中表示控件。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: The personalization scope of this property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.Shared> and can be modified only by authorized users.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的个性化作用域设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.Shared>和仅授权用户可以修改。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute> and [Web Parts Personalization Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute>和[Web 部件个性化概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.CatalogIconImageUrl%2A> property for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, so that an image appears with the control in a catalog of controls.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.CatalogIconImageUrl%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制，以便与控件的目录中的控件显示的图像。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes the use of a custom control, `TextDisplayWebPart`, created in the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 此示例假定自定义控件，使用`TextDisplayWebPart`中的示例部分创建<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>类概述。

trans-unit.source: The code example also uses a custom user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web Parts page.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例还使用自定义用户控件，使用户能够更改 Web 部件页面上的显示模式。

trans-unit.source: The user control is referenced by means of a `Register` directive near the top of the Web page that hosts the user control.
trans-unit.target: 该用户控件引用的方式`Register`指令承载用户控件的 Web 页面顶部附近。

trans-unit.source: For a detailed description of how to create this user control and work with display modes, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何创建此用户控件和显示模式使用的详细说明，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。

trans-unit.source: In the declarative markup of the Web page, note the `<asp:CatalogZone>` element.
trans-unit.target: 在网页上的声明性标记中，请注意`<asp:CatalogZone>`元素。

trans-unit.source: Nested within it are several elements, including an `<aspSample:TextDisplayWebPart>` element.
trans-unit.target: 嵌套在它里面了多个元素，包括`<aspSample:TextDisplayWebPart>`元素。

trans-unit.source: This set of elements enables the custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control to appear in a catalog.
trans-unit.target: 此组元素可使自定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件显示在目录中。

trans-unit.source: In the markup for the `<aspSample:TextDisplayWebPart>` element, notice that the `CatalogIconImageUrl` attribute is assigned a string that contains the URL to an image file.
trans-unit.target: 中的标记`<aspSample:TextDisplayWebPart>`元素，请注意，`CatalogIconImageUrl`属性分配一个字符串，包含的图像文件的 URL。

trans-unit.source: Load the page in a browser and use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to change the display mode to catalog mode.
trans-unit.target: 加载的浏览器并使用页**显示模式**下拉列表控件来显示模式更改为目录模式。

trans-unit.source: Then use the catalog user interface (UI) to add the custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control to the page.
trans-unit.target: 然后使用目录用户界面 (UI) 添加自定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>到页面的控件。

trans-unit.source: The internal validation system has determined that the URL might contain script attacks.
trans-unit.target: 内部验证系统已确定 URL 可能包含脚本攻击。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether a part control is in a minimized or normal state.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置部件控件是处于最小化状态还是正常状态。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeState" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeState" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeState.Normal" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeState.Normal" />。

trans-unit.source: A part control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ChromeState%2A> property value can be normal or minimized.
trans-unit.target: 一个部分的控件的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ChromeState%2A>属性值可以是正常或最小化。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class overrides the base property so that end users can personalize it.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>类重写基属性，以便最终用户可以对其进行个性化。

trans-unit.source: For a code example that uses this property, see the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeState%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 有关使用此属性的代码示例，请参阅文章<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeState%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The value specified is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeState" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值不是 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeState" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of border that frames a Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置构成 Web 部件控件的框架的边框类型。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeType" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeType" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeType.Default" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeType.Default" />。

trans-unit.source: A part control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.WebPartManager%2A> property determines what kind of border surrounds the control.
trans-unit.target: 一个部分的控件的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.WebPartManager%2A>属性确定哪种类型的边框环绕控件。

trans-unit.source: Options include showing a title only, a border only, a title and border, neither, or the default option, which simply uses the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartChromeType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 选项包括显示标题、 只、 仅边框、 标题和边框，两者，或只需使用的值的默认选项<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartChromeType%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class overrides the base property so that end users can personalize it.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>类重写基属性，以便最终用户可以对其进行个性化。

trans-unit.source: For a code example that uses this property, see the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 有关使用此属性的代码示例，请参阅文章<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeType%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The value is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeType" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 该值不是 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeType" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Gets an error message to display to users if errors occur during the connection process.
trans-unit.target: 获取在连接过程中发生错误时要向用户显示的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the error message.
trans-unit.target: 包含错误消息的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The content of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ConnectErrorMessage%2A> property is supplied internally by the Web Parts control set.
trans-unit.target: 内容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ConnectErrorMessage%2A>由 Web 部件控件集内部提供属性。

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of custom <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" /> controls that can be used to edit a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control when it is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 返回自定义 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" /> 控件的集合，这些控件可用于在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控件处于编辑模式时对其进行编辑。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection" /> that contains custom <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" /> controls associated with a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection" />，包含与 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" /> 控件关联的自定义 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控件。

trans-unit.source: Developers can use this method to create instances of custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls that they want to associate with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 开发人员可以使用此方法创建的自定义实例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>他们想要将与相关联的控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件。

trans-unit.source: The method is called when a user clicks the edit verb on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 当用户单击编辑谓词时调用该方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件。

trans-unit.source: Any new instance of an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control that is created in this method must have a value assigned to its ID property before it can be added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase.EditorParts%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 任何新实例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>在此方法中创建的控件必须具有之前将它添加到分配给其 ID 属性的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase.EditorParts%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: For a code example that uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.CreateEditorParts%2A> method, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 有关代码示例使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.CreateEditorParts%2A>方法，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>类概述。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a brief phrase that summarizes what the part control does, for use in ToolTips and catalogs of part controls.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一条短语，该短语在部件控件的工具提示和目录中用来概述该部件控件的作用。

trans-unit.source: A string that briefly summarizes the part control's functionality.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，简要概述部件控件的功能。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Description%2A> property is typically a string that is used in catalogs that provide lists of part controls, and as a ToolTip in the part control's title bar.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Description%2A>属性通常是提供列表的一部分控件，以及部件控件的标题栏中的工具提示的目录中使用的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The content of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Description%2A> property appears in a ToolTip when you position your mouse pointer over the title text in a part control's title bar.
trans-unit.target: 内容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Description%2A>属性时将鼠标指针放置上一个部分的控件的标题栏中的标题文本工具提示中显示。

trans-unit.source: The ToolTip text is created from the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.DisplayTitle%2A> property, followed by a hyphen, followed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Description%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: 工具提示文本创建的值从<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.DisplayTitle%2A>属性后, 接一个连字符后, 跟<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Description%2A>属性值。

trans-unit.source: For a code example that uses this property, see the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Description%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 有关使用此属性的代码示例，请参阅文章<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Description%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The personalization scope of this property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.Shared> and can be modified only by authorized users.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的个性化作用域设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.Shared>和仅授权用户可以修改。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute> and [Web Parts Personalization Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute>和[Web 部件个性化概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the horizontal direction that content flows within the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置内容在控件中流动的水平方向。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ContentDirection" /> that indicates the horizontal direction content will flow.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ContentDirection" />，指示内容流动的水平方向。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class overrides the base property values so that ends users can personalize the property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>类重写基属性值，以便最终用户可以对属性进行个性化设置。

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that contains the full title text actually displayed in the title bar of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control instance.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个字符串，其中包含在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控件实例的标题栏中实际显示的完整标题文本。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the complete, displayed title of the control.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示控件的完整显示标题的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.DisplayTitle%2A> property returns either the current value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A> property or, if the control has no title, a calculated value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.DisplayTitle%2A>属性返回的当前值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A>属性或如果控件具有没有标题，计算得出的值。

trans-unit.source: The calculated value consists of a localizable resource string for untitled controls, plus (if there are multiple controls within the zone) a number based on the index of the control within the zone.
trans-unit.target: 计算的值由无标题控件的可本地化的资源字符串和一个数字 （如果有该区域内的多个控件） 根据该区域中的控件索引。

trans-unit.source: For custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls where the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Subtitle%2A> property has been overridden to return a string value to use as a subtitle, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.DisplayTitle%2A> property is concatenated with the subtitle to produce a complete title.
trans-unit.target: 为自定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制在何处<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Subtitle%2A>属性已被重写以返回一个字符串值可用作副标题，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.DisplayTitle%2A>属性串联在一起副标题以生成一个完整的标题。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.DisplayTitle%2A> property value also serves as part of a ToolTip that appears when a user positions the mouse pointer over the title bar of a control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.DisplayTitle%2A>属性值还充当的一部分时，会出现工具提示用户位置鼠标指针在控件的标题栏上。

trans-unit.source: The full ToolTip consists of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.DisplayTitle%2A> value, followed by a hyphen, followed by the value of the control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Description%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 完整的工具提示组成<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.DisplayTitle%2A>值后, 跟连字符后, 跟控件的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Description%2A>属性。
